attributes.action: Keep the Monarchy as it is with all its current powers, and therefore their lack of powers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Monarchy of the UK has been something that has been with the nation since 1707, and even before that with the Kingdoms of England and Scotland. This long tradition of a system of Monarchy in Britain does no harm, it brings revenue in through the tourism it brings and is also sentimental. Sign this petition if you agree and think the Monarchy should stay.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
